name: Thesis-Password retrieval from Windows
short_description: FOR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY. Unauthorized credential retrieval from a computer running Windows. Code to automate/combine of already finished projects to retrieve username and password from Windows partitions using linux running from a usb storage device, using tools as bkhive, samdump2, rcracki_mt to process core files from within the windows system to get the NTLM hash and rainbow tables to decrypt it. I do not have and do not claim ownership of any intellectual property not produced by me. Owners are the original respective coders/programmers. In any case, i'm not rensposible for any damage, physical or not. Use this at your own risk.
summary: Thesis project: Password retrieval from Windows
